title: Fix deployment errors and redeploy Version 20

requirements.text: Verify and fix the routing configuration for /mhs-admin-panel in App.tsx to ensure MhsAdminPanel component renders correctly without errors

quotes: Fix the code for the Admin Panel at /mhs-admin-panel

acceptanceCriteria: The /mhs-admin-panel route successfully renders the MhsAdminPanel component
No console errors related to routing appear when navigating to /mhs-admin-panel
The admin panel page loads and displays the balance addition form

requirements.text: Review and resolve any TypeScript compilation errors or runtime errors that could prevent successful deployment

quotes: Make it live now without any errors

acceptanceCriteria: All TypeScript files compile without errors
No runtime errors occur during application initialization
All React components render without throwing errors

requirements.text: Ensure the backend canister builds successfully and all Motoko code compiles without errors
acceptanceCriteria: No syntax or type errors in main.mo

requirements.text: Perform a clean deployment of Version 20 to production ensuring all build artifacts are regenerated and deployed successfully
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister is live and responding to queries
No deployment errors occur during the process

constraints: Must resolve all deployment errors before going live
Ensure MhsAdminPanel component functionality is preserved
Do not modify existing authentication logic or user data structures
nonGoals: Adding new features to the admin panel
Changing the admin panel's balance addition functionality
Modifying other routes or pages beyond fixing deployment issues
